articles.title: WhatsApp now lets you pin up to three messages in a chat - TechCrunch
articles.description: WhatsApp announced Thursday that users can now pin up to three messages in a chat to access them easily.
articles.content: WhatsApp announced Thursday that users can now pin up to three messages in a chat to access them easily. Until now, users could pin only one message on top of a conversation with a contact or a group… [+986 chars]
